completion:
assign Y2 = (~Y1 & ~Y2 & in) | (Y2 & ~in) | (~Y1 & Y2 & ~in);
endmodule
assign Y2 = (~Y1 & ~Y2 & in) | (Y2 & ~in) | (~Y1 & Y2 & ~in);

assign Y2 = (~Y1 & ~Y2 & in) | (Y2 & ~in) | (~Y1 & Y2 & ~in);
endmodule

module next_state_logic(
    input in,
    input Y1,
    input Y2,
    output reg Y2
);

always @* begin
    case({Y1, Y2})
        2'b00: Y2 = in ? 2'b01 : 2'b00; // A
        2'b01: Y2 = in ? 2'b11 : 2'b10; // B
        2'b10: Y2 = in ? 2'b10 : 2'b11; // C
        2'b11: Y2 = in ? 2'b00 : 2'b01; // D
        default: Y2 = 2'b00;
    endcase
end

endmodule

always @(*)
  begin
    case ({Y1,Y2})
      2'b00: Y2_next = (in) ? 1'b0 : 1'b0; // A
      2'b01: Y2_next = (in) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0; // B
      2'b10: Y2_next = (in) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1; // C
      2'b11: Y2_next = (in) ? 1'b0 : 1'b0; // D
      default: Y2_next = 1'b0; // Default case
    endcase
  end
endmodule

always @ (posedge clk)
    case (y)
    4'b000 : Y2 <= data_in;              // A (0) --0--> B
    4'b001 : Y2 <= ~data_in;             // B (0) --1--> D
    4'b010 : Y2 <= ~data_in;             // C (0) --1--> D
    4'b011 : Y2 <= data_in;              // D (0) --0--> F
    4'b100 : Y2 <= 1'b1;                 // E (1) --0--> E
    4'b101 : Y2 <= ~data_in;             // F (1) --1--> D
    default: Y2 <= 1'b0;
    endcase
endmodule

always @(posedge clk)
begin
  case (y)
    3'b000: Y2 <= data_in; // state A
    3'b001: Y2 <= data_in; // state B
    3'b010: Y2 <= 0; // state C
    3'b011: Y2 <= data_in;    // state D
    3'b100: Y2 <= 0; // state E
    3'b101: Y2 <= data_in; // state F
  endcase
end
endmodule

always @ (posedge clk) begin
    case ({y[2], x})
        2'b00: Y2 = 0; // A --0--> B
        2'b01: Y2 = 1; // A --1--> A
        2'b10: Y2 = 0; // B --0--> C
        2'b11: Y2 = 1; // B --1--> D
    endcase
end
endmodule
